name: Senior Unreal Engine Developer (Rapid Prototyping)
description:
Wargaming is seeking an experienced UE4 developer to join its Rapid Prototyping team in creating our next hit game! An ideal candidate will have extensive experience with UE4 with strong game development background and extensive knowledge of UE4 networking and multiplayer gameplay systems.

What will you do?

  • Develop game proofs-of-concept and prototypes to confirm or reject game design hypotheses

  • Contribute components for our in-house UE4 framework

  • Collaborate closely with design and art teams to flesh out implementation details

  • Share your UE4 knowledge with the team and learn from others

What are we looking for?

  • 2+ years of experience working as UE4 developer

  • 5+ years of experience working as software engineer in game development

  • 10+ years of experience in software development

  • Experience shipping at least 1 title based on UE4

  • Strong knowledge of modern C/C++ and UE4 Blueprints

  • Strong knowledge of multiplayer gameplay systems and network replication

  • Strong knowledge of at least one of the following UE4 subsystems: Gameplay Ability, Niagara FX, Animation

  • Ability to take light game design input and create a proof of concept implementation

What additional skills will help you stand out?

  • Experience with Unity or comparable game engines

  • Shader skills

  • Technical art skills

  • Degree in computer science or similar

  • Game design experience

  • Passion for making multiplayer games

About Wargaming:

Wargaming is an award-winning online game developer and publisher headquartered in Nicosia, Cyprus. Delivering legendary games since 1998, Wargaming has grown to become one of the leaders in the free-to-play MMO gaming industry with 4500+ employees and more than 20 offices globally. Over 200 million players enjoy Wargaming’s titles across all major gaming platforms, including the massively popular World of Tanks and World of Warships.

Working in our company means always having interesting challenges and gaining valuable experience while working with top-class experts.

Take your place among our passionate and experienced team and bring out the best in yourself at Wargaming!

Please see Wargaming Candidate Privacy Policy for details on how Wargaming uses your personal data.
